titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Office of College Relations Records, 1953-1986
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke April 2007

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Vassar College Office of College Relations Records

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials concerning the publicity work of the Vassar College News Office.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Previously known as the News Office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, clippings, reports, press releases concerning the publicity work of the Vassar College News Office.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

controlaccess.head: VCL Categories
controlaccess.subject: Vassar College Administrative Offices and Functions

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Office of College Relations Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
